mapper.sql: id, creator, modifier, ctime, mtime, name, note, type
mapper.insert: insert into role (id, creator, modifier, ctime, mtime, name, note, type) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifier,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into role
id,
creator,
modifier,
ctime,
mtime,
name,
note,
type,

mapper.update:
update role
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mtime = #{mtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update role set creator = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mtime = #{mtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
